title: Google pushes AI shopping features in search and Gemini chatbot
description: Google is adding a way for consumers to buy things while seeking artificial intelligence-powered answers on search and in its Gemini chatbot – part of a plan to make money more directly from consumers' AI use.

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - NVIDIA, Google, OpenAI among 400 exhibitors at AI Expo
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: OpenAI engineer warns of the day AI finally ‘disrupts everything’ for humans
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) and its possibilities have taken myriad industries by storm. From job displacements to affecting cognitive skills, the rapid advancement of AI tools has left professionals worrying about what the future holds. Hieu Pham, an engineer at OpenAI, recently sparked a discussion on the existential weight of AI.

title: RELX Projects ‘Strong’ Growth, Reassuring Investors on AI Risk
description: RELX Plc, the British information and analytics company that owns the LexisNexis and Elsevier brands, forecast “strong” revenue and profit growth this year, quelling investor concerns that new artificial intelligence products will threaten its business.

title: Elon Musk to xAI employees: We can win AI race by building a factory on Moon
description: Elon Musk has told xAI employees that building a factory on the Moon could give the company the computing power needed to win the AI race. He believes space-based infrastructure may become essential for training next-generation artificial intelligence.
content: Elon Musk has pitched one of his most ambitious ideas yet to employees at xAI. He wants to build a factory on the Moon to power the future of Artificial Intelligence (AI). During a recent internal meeting, Musk told staff that if xAI wants to stay ah... [2711 chars]

title: Living With AI: How Intelligent Machines Are Shaping Our Everyday Lives
description: Dewanshi Verma dewanshivermaa@gmail.com Artificial Intelligence has quietly crept into almost every corner of our daily lives. It’s no longer just a futuristic idea from movies or tech magazines; it’s in the devices we wake up to, the apps we scroll through, the cars we drive, and even the way doctors treat us. Most of the time, we barely notice it, yet AI is shaping how we live, work, and connect with the world around us. Its potential is enormous, […]

title: TCS m-cap falls below Rs 10 lakh crore as stock hits 52-week low amid Anthropic AI shock
description: Tata Consultancy Services' stock has plunged, pushing its market value below Rs 10 lakh crore. Fears of artificial intelligence disrupting the IT sector are growing. Stronger-than-expected US jobs data also dampened investor sentiment. This has led to a broad sell-off in the Nifty IT index. Experts suggest the Indian IT sector will continue to face challenges.
